metadata.title: UIDT v3.5: Unified Information-Density Theory - DESI-Optimized Framework
metadata.description: Version 3.5 presents a consolidated framework for the Yang-Mills mass gap and cosmological tensions. This revision integrates 2025 DESI DR2 and JWST CCHP data, fixing the holographic scale at 0.66 nm. It provides a parameter-free derivation of the mass gap (1.710 GeV) and a hierarchical suppression mechanism for the vacuum energy (10^33 residual). All claims are classified by evidence status (Category A-D).
metadata.notes: DESI-Optimized Revision. Supersedes v3.3 and v3.4.
